verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. <S%H2502>Deliver<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, from the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H120>man<s%>: <S%H5341>preserve<s%> me from the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>;
Which <S%H2803>imagine<s%> <S%H7451>mischiefs<s%> in their <S%H3820>heart<s%>; <S%H3117>continually<s%> are they gathered <S%H1481>together<s%> for <S%H4421>war<s%>.
They have <S%H8150>sharpened<s%> their <S%H3956>tongues<s%> like a <S%H5175>serpent<s%>; <S%H5919>adders'<s%> <S%H2534>poison<s%> is under their <S%H8193>lips<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.

<S%H8104>Keep<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, from the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>; <S%H5341>preserve<s%> me from the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>; who have <S%H2803>purposed<s%> to <S%H1760>overthrow<s%> my <S%H6471>goings<s%>.

The <S%H1343>proud<s%> have <S%H2934>hid<s%> a <S%H6341>snare<s%> for me, and <S%H2256>cords<s%>; they have <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H7568>net<s%> by the <S%H3027%H4570>wayside<s%>; they have <S%H7896>set<s%> <S%H4170>gins<s%> for me. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
I <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Thou art my <S%H410>God<s%>: <S%H238>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
O <S%H3069>GOD<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, the <S%H5797>strength<s%> of my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>, thou hast <S%H5526>covered<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5402>battle<s%>.

<S%H5414>Grant<s%> not, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H3970>desires<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>: <S%H6329>further<s%> not his wicked <S%H2162>device<s%>; lest they <S%H7311>exalt<s%> themselves. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
As for the <S%H7218>head<s%> of those that compass me <S%H4524>about<s%>, let the <S%H5999>mischief<s%> of their own <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> them.
Let burning <S%H1513>coals<s%> <S%H4131%H4131>fall<s%> upon them: let them be <S%H5307>cast<s%> into the <S%H784>fire<s%>; into deep <S%H4113>pits<s%>, that they rise not up <S%H6965>again<s%>.

Let not an evil <S%H376%H3956>speaker<s%> be <S%H3559>established<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>: <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall <S%H6679>hunt<s%> the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H4073>overthrow<s%> him.
I <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6213>maintain<s%> the <S%H1779>cause<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%>, and the <S%H4941>right<s%> of the <S%H34>poor<s%>.
Surely the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto thy <S%H8034>name<s%>: the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in thy <S%H6440>presence<s%>.
